column4: hello! I have a strange issue...I have a small vista partition(just in case...)I can only login in vista ONLY with the same keyboard. It don't recognise no other one  :(
this sounds like a vista problem, not a ubuntu problem?
that's not surprising. You shouldn't. You really hsouldn't in Vista either. The keyboard is the most basic, standard input device for a computer. Is it a USB keyboard or PS/2?
and you plugged in another usb keyboard and it didn't work in vista, but works in ubuntu?
